briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Influenza Vaccine in Elderly People
officialTitle: Observer-blind Safety and Immunogenicity Study of GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A When Administered to Elderly Subjects

arms.label: New generation influenza vaccine GSK2186877A Group

summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety of GSK Biologicals' influenza vaccine. Elderly subjects were randomized in the primary study (NCT00760617) and will now receive the same vaccine for the third time. For this study the masking is "observer-blind" for elderly subjects and "open" for young adult subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Reporting Any and Grade 3 Solicited Local Adverse Events (AEs)

effectByArm.arm: New Generation Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A Group
